title: Progress of research on purification of CH4 from a CH4/CO2/N2 mixture by pressure swing adsorption
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00919C, Review Article
Shuohao Li, Nuojie Wu, Yuqing Gong, Liang Wang
This review primarily addresses the types of adsorbents, molecular simulation, and process optimization involved in the purification of CH4 by variable pressure adsorption.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
